subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Justin Burke threw for a pair of touchdowns and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return to help Louisville beat Southern Mississippi, 31-28, in the Beef ’O’ Brady’s Bowl.
snippet: Justin Burke threw for a pair of touchdowns and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return to help Louisville beat Southern Mississippi, 31-28, in the Beef ’O’ Brady’s Bowl.
